title: Jira Issue Creation and Management Test
description: Verify that users can successfully create, view, edit, and transition issues through a workflow. The test should confirm that all issue management features work as expected.
preConditions: User has a valid Jira account and is logged in.
User has appropriate permissions to create and manage issues.
At least one project exists in the Jira instance.

steps.action: Navigate to a project and click 'Create Issue'.
steps.expectedResult: The issue creation form loads successfully with all fields visible.

steps.action: Enter issue details (summary, description, type, priority) and create the issue.
steps.expectedResult: The system creates the issue and displays it with all entered information.

steps.action: Edit the issue to update its fields and save changes.
steps.expectedResult: Changes are saved successfully and reflected in the issue details.

steps.action: Transition the issue to a different status in the workflow.
steps.expectedResult: Issue status is updated and the issue appears in the appropriate column on the board.
